intro: Stapeliopsis urniflora, commonly known as the urn-flowered stapeliopsis, is a species of flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Apocynaceae family and is characterized by its unique, urn-shaped flowers that are often yellow or orange in color. The plant produces small, fleshy leaves and has a compact, shrub-like growth habit. It is adapted to arid environments and requires well-drained soil and minimal water to thrive. Stapeliopsis urniflora is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its striking floral display.
